statements: DELETE FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_id = 100 AND location_id = 1;
DELETE FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 1000 OR player_name LIKE 'A%';
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id = 100 AND player_id = 5;
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 123 AND points > 100;
DELETE FROM players WHERE location = 'New York' AND player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name = 'High Score');
DELETE FROM scores WHERE score > 100 AND level_completed = true;
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM player_activity_log WHERE player_id = 2 AND location_id = 3;
